title: How To Lose A .50 Cal In 1 Day
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 rounds in the magazine ... Round 1: Mustache goofin with PFT Round 2: Our favorite branch of Homeland Security is at it again. This time instead of being a bunch of narcs and taking all the narcotics, they rescued some fellas that had been capsized 25 miles off the coast, were surrounded by sharks, and actively getting attacked by those same sharks. Round 3: In a very different and more pure example of the military, one unit lost a… wait.. no … this cant be… a fuckin 50 cal? OKKKKK Round 4: Good initiative, bad judgment is not a phrase or a mindset all militaries use. I read a really interesting article on Real Clear Defense about why ours works well. SUPPORT THE SHOW!
